ygData.subject: Hello Bristlebane
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow adventurers, may the Light of the Truthbringer shine upon you.  My name is Ardalen, an acolyte of Mithaniel Marr.  Currently, I reside in the once
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow adventurers, may the Light of the Truthbringer shine upon you. My name is Ardalen, an acolyte of Mithaniel Marr. Currently, I reside in the once fair city of Freeport, now little more than a ruinous slum thanks to Lucan D'lere and his orc loving Freeport Militia.

For those of you who seek enlightenment through Valor, my hammer and my spells are at your disposal. For the cowardly remainder, I'm afraid all I may offer you is a broken skull.

Ardalen
